about.appDesc: A tool to config SteveTaikoCon Controller and test any type of Tatacon.
about.freewareTip: This tool is an open-sourced freeware.

disabledTips.webHidUnsupported: Configuration page is disabled as your browser doesn't support WebHID API.
disabledTips.controllerNotConnected: Please connect your SteveTaikoCon / Tatacon by clicking button on the top-left.

sideKeyBinding.label: Key Binding of {side}
sideKeyBinding.description: The key that your controller will emulate to press when this side / button on controller is hit / pressed.

keyInvokeDuration.label: Key invoke duration
keyInvokeDuration.description: Define how long will the key be pressed. In milliseconds. Set to 0 for instant release.<1></1>If invoke time is too long, it may cause lagging. Or if invoke time is too short, the game maybe unable to detect the input.<3></3>If you can't determine how to adjust this value or you are playing official game, set to 16 ms for most of the game and cases.<5></5>If you are using emulators or any game that is <7>based on input events</7>, you can set to 0 for best experienses and lowest latency.

sensorMultiplier.label: Sensor value multiplier of {sensorSide}
sensorMultiplier.description: Will multiply the sensor value of this side by the number, default is 100%.

triggerThreshold.label: Trigger threshold
triggerThreshold.description: The input will enter detect state if any sensor value exceeded this number, unit can be considered as voltage (mV). <1></1>Too low a value may cause crosstalk, and too high a value may need more force to hit drum even can't be detected. <3></3>You can confirm your config effect at the test page.

ledHitIndicator.label: Enable LED hid indicator
ledHitIndicator.description: Can light up the on-board LED to response hits, red for surface and blue for rim. <1></1>You can use this to check the latency between the controller and the computer. (This LED can be considered as zero-latency)

doubleSideHitDetection.label: Enable double hit detection (Experimental)
doubleSideHitDetection.description: Whether treat both side hit as a double hit, and press both side of the buttons.

taikoControllerSelector.title: Detected Taiko Controllers
taikoControllerSelector.noControllerTip: Can't detect any Taiko Controllers<1></1>Please check your connection between your computer and controllers.<3></3>And make sure your controller has been switched into keyboard mode.

webHidCheck.title: WebHID API Unsupported
webHidCheck.desc: This website requires browser with WebHID API supported. Please use the latest browser like Chrome / Chromium or Microsoft Edge. Or install desktop version of Steve Taiko Configurator.
